sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Copy an Exchange calendar event’s attachment to ServiceNow record.

Inputs:

  • Event - Reference of the event record to which attachment has to attached.
  • Attachment Name - Name of the attachment.
  • Content (Base64 encoded) - Base64 encoded content of the attachment.
  • Content Type - Content type of the attachment.

Outputs:

  • Attachment Sys ID - Sys ID of the attachment created.
  • Status - If attachment is successfully attached, Status is set to "Success". If there is a failure, Status is set to "Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Copy Attachment to Event Record
